lyrics:
6 contributorshangnail lyricsverse 1
my hopes just fell and i cant see
the reason why why there is blood on my sleeve
and all this time i thought it mine
but its not its yours and

chorus

this life you lead like us living in a shiny ballroom

they wont make no statues of you
